data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=qBc3WSDUSJUQ7kNvgH_-e82&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD8T7Dym5w2NkpMbYsK8jLwi5ochBhHkoa-JDc6KD1PCw&oe=66619BB7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=X4SWEXVWa-wQ7kNvgEvSJXs&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCwgTRnwWu5xlSPWKeE4IMHFss0B-mZRYT1Pl-rioRYgQ&oe=6661A952)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982555_716104293832637_6157177355803125122_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=3--Wwpp2Dm8Q7kNvgE_Z3R5&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC1u6gXSYHR65NWsUUR513JXwt7ANSI-C3Uo__jJL7yOA&oe=6661ACD0)
